comments:
I downloaded the 1.0M1 build of visual editor and gave it a run on OS X.  Disclaimer: I don't know if it is 
supposed to work on OS X yet, so this might be premature, and it's also my first experience with VE so I 
might have done something wrong.

Anyway, I tried creating a new frame extending JFrame which produced a failure message with 
instructions to see the log.  Log messages included below, but in spite of that it seemed to work.

VE as of 1.2 M1 no longer crashes at startup.  Please add yourself to the CC list on bug 47716 if you'd like to watch the progress of supporting VE on OS X.
Since fixed at M1 we're closing it.
